pkgmetadata.longdescription: # py2mdRun python code in Jupyter to generate markdown reports.**Usage:**```py2md test_py2md.py```This will then run Jupyter and generate a md file output with associated images.**Debug Usage:**```py2md test_py2md.py -debug```This will also print out all Jupyter output to see if anything is missing from the output.**No Code, No Cell Headers and inline images Usage:**```py2md test_py2md.py -nocode -nohead -inline```This will hide the python code block as well as cell headers and all images will be part of the markdown file as html code.
